title: False Hydra
desc:
Post 2215
- Can and must be played upon drawing the card
- All players forget what cards they have (text is changed to ??? [???]), and the cards are put in random order
- If a player tries to play an invalid card, it is revealed to them and their turn is skipped
- All cards are revealed if two rounds (or at least 8 turns) go by without a card being played
